# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="61175-102">在 Outlook.com 中保存邮件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="61175-103">您不能在 Outlook.com 中保存电子邮件，但可以将其打印到可在电脑上保存的 PDF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="61175-104">Windows 10 中包含的 Microsoft 打印到 PDF 实用程序允许您将任何电子邮件直接打印到 PDF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="61175-105">选择要保存的邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="61175-106">选择三个点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="61175-107">在邮件顶部，然后选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="61175-108">**打印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="61175-109">再次选择 " **打印** "，然后从 "打印机" 下拉菜单中，选择 " **MICROSOFT 打印为 PDF**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="61175-110">选择 " **打印**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="61175-111">输入文件名，然后选择 " **保存**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="61175-112">**注意：** 在共享或公用计算机上不建议这样做，因为其他用户可以访问保存到电脑且不删除的任何 Pdf。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="61175-113">有关打印的详细信息，请参阅 [在 Outlook.com 中打印电子邮件、附件和日历](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61175-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
